titles.title: PILT and Refuge Revenue Sharing Permanent Funding Act
To provide permanent funding for the payment in lieu of taxes program, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E241)
Referred to the Subcommittee on Fisheries, Wildlife, and Oceans.
Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks, Forests, and Public Lands.

bill.summary:
1/31/2007--Introduced.
PILT and Refuge Revenue Sharing Permanent Funding Act - Provides permanent funding for the following programs: (1) Bureau of Land Management Payment in Lieu of Taxes (PILT); and (2) the U.S. Fish and Wildlife Service's refuge revenue sharing program.
